.
Reviewing FPOW Claims
Review all claims from FPOWs, including original claims, supplemental claims, and claims for an increased evaluation, to determine if the
Veteranâ€™s record confirms FPOW status, and
Veteran was examined under the FPOW protocol.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C - Development and Examination Request for Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C
